mapper.update:
update oauth2_authorized_client
client_registration_id = #{row.clientRegistrationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principal_name = #{row.principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_token_type = #{row.accessTokenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_token_issued_at = #{row.accessTokenIssuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
access_token_expires_at = #{row.accessTokenExpiresAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
access_token_scopes = #{row.accessTokenScopes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refresh_token_issued_at = #{row.refreshTokenIssuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_at = #{row.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
access_token_value = #{row.accessTokenValue,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
refresh_token_value = #{row.refreshTokenValue,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},

update oauth2_authorized_client set client_registration_id = #{row.clientRegistrationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_name = #{row.principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_token_type = #{row.accessTokenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_token_issued_at = #{row.accessTokenIssuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, access_token_expires_at = #{row.accessTokenExpiresAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, access_token_scopes = #{row.accessTokenScopes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refresh_token_issued_at = #{row.refreshTokenIssuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{row.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, access_token_value = #{row.accessTokenValue,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, refresh_token_value = #{row.refreshTokenValue,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}

update oauth2_authorized_client
access_token_type = #{accessTokenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_token_issued_at = #{accessTokenIssuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
access_token_expires_at = #{accessTokenExpiresAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
